text:
e="preserve">Heidi Lynn Gardner (born July 27, 1983) is an American actress and comedian. She was born in Kansas City, Missouri. She is known as a cast member on "Saturday Night Live". She also voices the anthropomorphic cat Cooch on the Crackle series "SuperMansion".
In 2018, she played the supporting role of Leonor in the Ben Falcone movie "Life of the Party".
Gardner is known for her impressions of Dana Bash, Kristen Schaal, Allison Janney, Ariana Grande and Taylor Swift.
